mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_scheduled WHERE post_assignment_id = #{postAssignmentId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT s.* FROM t_scheduled s LEFT JOIN t_post_assignment pa ON pa.id = s.`post_assignment_id` LEFT JOIN t_activity_assignment aa ON aa.id = pa.`activity_assignment_id` LEFT JOIN t_activity a ON a.id = aa.`activity_id` WHERE a.id = #{activityId} AND s.`user_id` = #{userId} ORDER BY s.`create_time` DESC
